original_text: But if they will not listen, take one or two others along, so that ‘every matter may be established by the testimony of two or three witnesses.’
korean_text: 만일 듣지 않거든 한두 사람을 데리고 가서 두세 증인의 입으로 말마다 확증하게 하라

sentences.original_text: But if they will not listen,
take one or two others along,
so that 'every matter may be established
by the testimony of two or three witnesses.'
